TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi RibbonQuickAccessToolBar extends System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl

summary.span: 表示在窗口框架中一直可见以提供对常见命令的访问的功能区工具栏。

span.span: Represents a ribbon toolbar that is always visible in the window frame to provide access to common commands.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您将添加到通过指定的内容控件属性使用 XAML[属性元素语法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md)。You add a to a control by specifying it as the content of the property using XAML [Property Element Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md). ``` ... ``` 以下列表显示了典型的放置功能区元素的层次结构中。The following list shows the typical placement of the in the hierarchy of ribbon elements. - - 属性 property - - , , , , , , , , - , , , , - ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个简单的功能区，创建的 Visual Studio 2010 模板，帮助窗格和快速访问工具栏元素添加。The following example shows a simple ribbon that is created by the Visual Studio 2010 template, with help pane and Quick Access Toolbar elements added. [!code-xaml[Ribbon_Snippets#RibbonDefault](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ribbon_snippets/cs/mainwindow.xaml#ribbondefault)]
